Experience.name: Institute for Advanced Study, Princeton University
Experience.summary: Teaching at Palmer Physical Laboratory (now 302 Frist Campus Center). While not a professor at Princeton, I associated with the physics professors and continued to give lectures on campus.

Education.institution: University of Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing/Chengdu, China

Awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
Awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'
